pages.text: High velocity rocks...$(br2)Its generally bad practice to shoot rocks out of a firearm. While its a bit stronger than $(l:ammunition/wood_musket_ball)wooden musket balls$(), it will fall much faster and so you'll need to be closer to your target.
$(o)Deals $(l)2.20$()$(o) base damage. See $(l:ammunition/bullet_velocities_info)Guide: Bullet Damage$()$(o) for more information.$(br2)$(l)15%$()$(o) chance to misfire.
